name: nucore_router_tool
description: Results from searching the device database for relevant devices based on user query

intent.description: Primary intent of the user query: command_control (immediate device actions), routine_automation (scheduled/conditional logic), real_time_status (query current state), query_information (device capabilities/info)

devices.description: Matched devices ranked by relevance score

reasoning.description: Brief explanation of why this device is relevant
